home-about-content:
We are a company that offers a digital platform where you can find scooters for all types of users.
 So, what you need is a scooter if you need another type of mobility, 
 on this page you will find everything you need quickly, easily and safely.
 Also, you will never have to worry about not finding the right bike, in this place you can find what you need according to your needs'
home-options-title: its the easiest way to find scooters for...
home-option1-content: If you need a scooter for a short trip, this is the best place to find it.
home-option2-content: If you need a scooter for a long trip, this is the best place to find it.
home-option3-content: If you need a scooter for any type of trip, this is the best place to find it.
home-get-started-content:
Join our discord server and start your journey today!
